Name: Dead on Arrival: Remastered
About the game: Dead On Arrival: Remastered is a first person escape room horror full of interesting puzzles, settings and an exciting story. Game story While on the train home from work, Sean receives a cryptic warning before a freak accident causes his train to derail. Waking up after the crash, seemingly unharmed, Sean dismisses the crash as a nightmare. But as things turn out not to be what they seem, Sean’s past returns to haunt him, and the absolute nightmare has only just begun. Early Access story After witnessing a horrifying memory, Sean stumbles into another living nightmare. Stuck in an eerie hotel complex. His dark past starts to unravel as he begins to investigate a seemingly unknown environment. Features The remastered version brings new features and improves on gameplay from the original classic. Immersive narrative: Told through both items in-game and cutscenes this will be a story to remember Complex puzzles: Original puzzles that can't be solved easily, better keep an eye out for clues Great atmosphere: Lighting, VFX, sound design and level design have been used to lovingly craft the atmosphere throughout the entire game Scary Horror: Using suspenseful horror elements it uses the great atmosphere to its advantage to deliver a genuinely terrifying experience A first-person adventure: Featuring 4 detailed and content-full levels This game is a continuation of a previously released university project developed by a small, passionate team involved with the original production. This Steam Release Is Brought to You By Alex Slous Ben Hendry David Ling Eoin Matthews Erik Viking Matej Gajdoš
